H0.text: Who was the longest serving US president (12 years 39 days). George Washington

H1.text: Who was the longest serving US president (12 years 39 days). Thomas Jefferson

H2.text: Who was the longest serving US president (12 years 39 days). Abraham Lincoln

H3.text: Who was the longest serving US president (12 years 39 days). FDR

A4.text: Franklin Delano Roosevelt was the longest-serving U.S. president, as well as the only one to have served more than two terms.

A5.text: Roosevelt served from 1933 until his death in 1945.
